description: Search and retrieve data from knowledge.

knowledge_base.info: Select the knowledge to load data from.

api_key.info: API key for the embedding provider to generate embeddings.

search_query.info: Optional search query to filter knowledge base data.

top_k.info: Number of top results to return from the knowledge base.

include_metadata.info: Whether to include all metadata in the output. If false, only content is returned.

include_embeddings.info: Whether to include embeddings in the output. Only applicable if 'Include Metadata' is enabled.

retrieve_data.info: Returns the data from the selected knowledge base.
